column1: Development of a plant-base prototype to replace beef protein, we want explore the use of fiber (flaxseed add fiber to the patty)  and chicken peas flour and asian profiles (tamari / rice vinegar consider bases for asian cusine)

Premix for plant based patties. Using pea protein, with regular spices (onion/garlic), and meat-like flavors (yeast extract, meat flavor, inosinate, guanylate), smokey flavors, and meat-like appearance (beet juice)
Basic seasoning premix for a beef patty.
Premix for taco seasoned (paprika, cumin, black pepper, garlic, oregano, lemon, sour cream, cinnamon) soy patty not spicy profile.
